languages.text: {n}Вы пробуете нажать на клавиши и повернуть пару бобин. Все, что вам удается добиться — это пары вспыхнувших на приборной доске люменов, утробного звука из глубин машины и включения дополнительного малого экрана, на который начинают выводиться данные.{/n}

{n}You try pressing keys and spinning a couple of reels. In response, a few lumens light up on the control panel, a low guttural growl reverberates through the machine, and a small auxiliary screen lights up, presenting you with information.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы пробуете нажать на клавиши и повернуть пару бобин. Все, что вам удается добиться — это пары вспыхнувших на приборной доске люменов, утробного звука из глубин машины и включения дополнительного малого экрана, на который начинают выводиться данные.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You try pushing the keys and spinning a couple of reels. In response, a couple of lumens light up on the control board, a low guttural growl reverberates through the machine and a small auxiliary screen lights up, presenting you with information.{/n}

{n}You try pushing the keys and spinning a couple of reels. In response, a couple of lumens light up on the control board, a low guttural growl reverberates through the machine and a small auxiliary screen lights up, presenting you with information.{/n}

{n}You try pressing keys and spinning a couple of reels. In response, a few lumens light up on the control panel, a low guttural growl reverberates through the machine, and a small auxiliary screen lights up, presenting you with information.{/n}

{n}You try pressing keys and spinning a couple of reels. In response, a few lumens light up on the control panel, a low guttural growl reverberates through the machine, and a small auxiliary screen lights up, presenting you with information.{/n}

{n}You try pressing keys and spinning a couple of reels. In response, a few lumens light up on the control panel, a low guttural growl reverberates through the machine, and a small auxiliary screen lights up, presenting you with information.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你试着按下按键，转动了几个旋钮。作为回应，控制面板上亮起了几盏流明灯。机器中回响着低沉的吼叫声，一个小小的辅助屏幕亮了起来，向你发送着信息。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try pressing keys and spinning a couple of reels. In response, a few lumens light up on the control panel, a low guttural growl reverberates through the machine, and a small auxiliary screen lights up, presenting you with information.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你试着按下按键，转动了几个旋钮。作为回应，控制面板上亮起了几盏流光灯。机器中回响着低沉的吼叫声，一个小小的辅助屏幕亮了起来，向你发送着信息。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pruebas a pulsar unas teclas y hacer girar unos rodillos. En respuesta, algunos lumens se iluminan en el panel de control, un gruñido gutural recorre la máquina y una pequeña pantalla auxiliar se ilumina y te ofrece información.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try pressing keys and spinning a couple of reels. In response, a few lumens light up on the control panel, a low guttural growl reverberates through the machine, and a small auxiliary screen lights up, presenting you with information.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pruebas a pulsar unas teclas y hacer girar unos rodillos. En respuesta, algunos lumens se iluminan en el panel de control, un gruñido gutural recorre la máquina y una pequeña pantalla auxiliar se ilumina y te ofrece información.{/n}

languages.text: {n}キーを押してリールをいくつか回転させてみる。すると、コントロールパネルにポツポツと光が点灯し、喉から出るような低い唸り声が機械中に響き渡る中、小さな補助画面が点灯して情報を表示した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try pressing keys and spinning a couple of reels. In response, a few lumens light up on the control panel, a low guttural growl reverberates through the machine, and a small auxiliary screen lights up, presenting you with information.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}キーを押してリールをいくつか回転させてみる。すると、コントロールパネルにポツポツと光が点灯し、喉から出るような低い唸り声が機械中に響き渡る中、小さな補助画面が点灯して情報を表示した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du drückst einige Tasten und drehst an einigen Rädern. Daraufhin leuchten auf dem Bedienfeld einige Lumens auf, ein tiefes, kehliges Knurren durchzieht die Maschine, und ein kleiner Hilfsbildschirm wird aktiviert, der dir Informationen anzeigt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try pressing keys and spinning a couple of reels. In response, a few lumens light up on the control panel, a low guttural growl reverberates through the machine, and a small auxiliary screen lights up, presenting you with information.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du drückst einige Tasten und drehst an einigen Rädern. Daraufhin leuchten auf dem Bedienfeld einige Lumens auf, ein tiefes, kehliges Knurren durchzieht die Maschine, und ein kleiner Hilfsbildschirm wird aktiviert, der dir Informationen anzeigt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous essayez d'appuyer sur des touches et de tourner des boutons. En réponse, quelques lumens s'allument sur le panneau de contrôle et un grognement guttural émerge de la machine, tandis que des informations s'affichent sur un petit écran auxiliaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try pressing keys and spinning a couple of reels. In response, a few lumens light up on the control panel, a low guttural growl reverberates through the machine, and a small auxiliary screen lights up, presenting you with information.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous essayez d'appuyer sur des touches et de tourner des boutons. En réponse, quelques lumens s'allument sur le panneau de contrôle et un grognement guttural émerge de la machine, tandis que des informations s'affichent sur un petit écran auxiliaire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tuşlara basarak, düğmeleri çevirerek şansını deniyorsun. Buna istinaden kontrol panelindeki lümenlerden birkaçı aydınlanıyor ve makineden tok sesli bir hırıltı yükseliyor. Küçük ikincil ekran açılıp yeni bilgileri gözler önüne seriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try pressing keys and spinning a couple of reels. In response, a few lumens light up on the control panel, a low guttural growl reverberates through the machine, and a small auxiliary screen lights up, presenting you with information.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tuşlara basıyor, düğmeleri çevirerek şansını deniyorsun. Buna istinaden kontrol panelindeki lümenlerden birkaçı aydınlanıyor ve makineden tok sesli bir hırıltı yükseliyor. Küçük ikincil ekran etkinleşip yeni bilgileri gözler önüne seriyor.{/n}
